item.title: [GRA5/GRA7/GRA9/SBG5/WAW1/SGP1/BHS5/SYD1/DE1/UK1/VA1/OR1][Public cloud]]End of life for Kubernetes1.20
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 21, 08:00 UTC  -  Mar 23, 17:00 UTC

Jan 4, 02:05 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 21/03/2023 08:00 UTC
End time : 23/03/2023 17:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact except for the apps that do not support the new version (1.21).
Service improvement : The aim of this maintenance is to upgrade deprecated clusters to a supported newer version (1.21).

item.title: [GRA][ManagedPrivateRegistry] - Registries version upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 14, 19:00 - 23:00 UTC

Jan 17, 23:30 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 14/03/2023 19:00 UTC
End time : 14/03/2023 23:00 UTC
Service impact : The registries will be set in read-only mode and the registries will be unavailable for a few minutes during the operation.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we need to perform a version upgrade on the registries.

item.title: [UK1][Workflow Management] - Mistral
item.description:

Jan 17, 21:37 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 02/02/2023 13:00 UTC 
End time : 02/02/2023 16:00 UTC

item.title: [BHS5/DE1/GRA5/GRA7/GRA9/SBG5/SGP1/SYD1/WAW1/UK1/US-EAST-VA-1/US-WEST-OR-1][Containers & Orchestration] - Possibility to upgrade kernel nodes version by using the security update (patch) policy
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 30, 10:00 - 17:00 UTC

Jan 27, 09:30 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 30/01/2023 10:00 UTC
End time : 30/01/2023 17:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As described in our public roadmap (https://github.com/ovh/public-cloud-roadmap/issues/259), this maintenance is scheduled to provide to the MKS users the possibility to update their Managed Kubernetes Services. This release will rollout/rebuild the Kubernetes nodes onto a GNU/Linux kernel in version 5.4 (based on the Ubuntu kernel linux-image-generic-hwe-18.04).
Additional information: All new delivered nodes will be installed with this new GNU/Linux Kernel version.
